title: Getting to Gold again.

embed.description: Well, now that I have reached gold. I decided to try and reach it again on my Smurf account. Gotten it from Silver 5 to Silver 2. Lets see if I can do it again, with waaaay less champions and runes.

body:
Well, since I've already reached gold.
I thought I would try again, with my other account that has less runes and champions.
Gotten it form Silver 5 to Silver 2.

Also, trying new format so it looks different to the rest.
